All features: Compact body, clear and powerful sound
Enjoy big sound with the super-compact SRS-XB100 wireless speaker, offering powerful, clear sound, a waterproof and dustproof design1,2, and up to 16 hours of battery life.3
"The Sony XB100 makes our favorite travel speaker even better"CNN5/2023
Sony brings you closer to the music and the artists you love. Watch exclusive videos and enter to win prizes only available for Sony fans.
Key features
Sound Quality
Portability
Usability
Enjoy powerful, clear sound, with a deep bass anywhere you go
Portable and durable for life on the go
Get more from your speaker
Listen loud and clear from a compact speaker

Music is the soundtrack to our lives, and we want you to be able to enjoy your tunes wherever you are. So we’ve packed powerful, clear sound into a portable body. If you love good music and listening with friends, the XB100 is your perfect partner.
Passive radiator for powerful sound
A passive radiator works together with a full-range speaker to enhance low-end tones, giving bass a boost.
Keep it clear with the off-center diaphragm
The off-centre design and optimized weight balance enhance clarity, providing clear sound even at high volumes.A = Conventional diaphragmB = Off-centre diaphragm
Sound Diffusion Processor for expansive sound
Sound Diffusion Processor spreads sound in any space, for a richer and more expansive sound.
Take your sound anywhere
Let nothing hold you back

Get out and explore with the XB100 by your side. This portable speaker is built for life on the go, and is durable and long-lasting enough to keep up with you wherever you go. Plus, it comes with a multiway strap that you can use to carry or attach.
Up to 16 hours of battery life
Listen longer—the XB100’s battery lasts up to 16 hours and has a convenient battery status indicator.3
Take it wherever you want

The durable exterior and strap make this speaker ready for just about anything.  Hang it from your backpack, from your wrist, or even from a tree when you’re out in the sun, and the downward-facing speaker will project the sound down to where you are.
IP67 rated waterproof and dustproof
The extra-durable XB100 is waterproof and dustproof with an IP67 rating1,2 and a new UV coating, so you can take your tunes to go—whether it’s the pool or camping.
Better call quality with Echo Cancelling
With the XB100’s Echo Cancelling technology, two people can talk at the same time with no clipping or cutting out.
Add an extra speaker for stereo sound
If you want an even bigger sound, connect two XB100 speakers wirelessly for stereo sound that will spread even further.4
USB Type-C® port
You can charge the XB100 with the USB Type-C® port.
Bluetooth® Connection and Fast Pair7 technology
In one tap, the Sony XB100 enables quick effortless Bluetooth pairing with your Android™ devices.6
